item.title: #28: July 14, 2012
item.description:
#28: July 14, 2012

Hour 1
01. The Ruts - Staring At The Rude Boys / The Punk Singles Collection
02. The Damned - Smash It Up (single version) / single
03. Wire - Ex-Lion Tamer / Pink Flag
04. The Buzzcocks – Breakdown / Spiral Scratch
05. The UK Subs - Emotional Blackmail / Brand New Age
06. The Mob - Shuffling Souls / single (on the Let The Tribe Increase CD)
07. The Ruts - Savage Circle / The Crack
08. The Melvins Lite - Freak Puke / Freak Puke
09. Japandroids - Younger Us / Celebration Rock
10. Terakaft - Imad Halan / Kel Tamasheq
11. Jay Reatard - We Who Wait / Blood Visions
12. The Ruts - Jah War / The Punk Singles Collection
13. Brian Eno - Blank Frank / Here Come The Warm Jets
14. The Ladies - And Them / They Mean Us
15. Leadbelly - The Bourgeois Blues / Complete Works Volume 1 (‘39-‘40)
16. Discharge - Realities of War / Singles


Hour 2
01. Black Sabbath - Into the Void / Master Of Reality
01. Acid Mothers Temple- Golem Rock / Ominous From The Cosmic Inferno
03. Afflicted Man – Why / Complete (homemade CDR)
20. Miles Davis - Great Expectations / Complete Bitches Brew Sessions
04. Valet - Blood Is Clean / Blood Is Clean
05. Excepter - Teleportation: ASK / Presidence
06. The Ruts - It Was Cold / The Crack
item.author: mr.hughes@hotmail.com (Gareth Hughes)
